effects.full_english_text: When you would roll a die as part of a Holomem's Ability or Arts you may set the result.
Can be used during your opponent's turn when one of your Holomems with #Promise takes damage: reduce that damage by 50.
When your Holomem is downed on opponent's turn: Distribute all Green Cheer from that Holomem.
When you use a Red Holomem's Ability/Arts that Archives cards from your hand: you may Archive any number them from your Holopower instead.
When your Red Holomem is downed on the opponent's turn: lose 1 less LIFE. You may take it and all stacked Holomem into your hand.
When this or a Blue Holomem deals damage to your opponent's Back Holomem: deal 50 damage to one of your opponent's Back Holomem
When your Blue Holomem deals damage to your opponent's Center or Collab Holomem: deal equal special damage to one of your opponent's Back Holomem
When you archive Cheer with a Blue Holomem Ability/Arts: deal 20 Special damage to any of your opponent's Holomem.

gift_effects.full_english_text: 1/Turn (Collab only) When a Holomem takes damage from the opponent, you may roll a die. If odd, prevent the damage.

art_effects.full_english_text: Roll a die. This art gains +10 Power times the result.
Roll 3 dice. This art gains +10 Power times total result.
You may Archive 1 card from hand to: reveal a 1st Bloom holomem (excluding Buzz holomem) from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.
Archive 0-5 cards from your hand. Deal 20 special damage per to your opponent's Center or Collab.

effects.full_english_text:
Roll a die. If the result is 3 or less, Archive one of your opponent's holomems' Cheer.
If your Oshi is Nanashi Mumei, you may instead perform the following effect: (Once per game) Archive 2 Cheer from your opponent's Center.
